lastSession.summary: v6.2.0: Migrated /prd-breakdown from legacy subagent pipeline to Agent Teams. Added preflight check, replaced Subagent 1/2/3 with product-analyst/architect/qa-lead teammates, switched from Task tool spawning to Agent Teams delegate mode with TeammateIdle completion. Renamed subagent-prompts.json to analyst-prompts.json.
completedTasks: Rewrote prd-breakdown.md Phase 1 from subagent to Agent Teams pattern
Added Phase 0.5 Agent Teams preflight check
Updated README.md subagent references and directory tree
Renamed subagent-prompts.json to analyst-prompts.json in setup.sh
Bumped version to 6.2.0 in plugin.json and .plugin-version
nextSteps: Consider migrating any remaining subagent references in RELEASES/ (historical, low priority)
